name: Happy Salvage
overview: Happy Salvage is a mix between a first person perspective adventure dating game and an action game. The game puts the player in the role of a young boy that lives in a small town in an island. He first has to go around the town and explore the island to meet the people of the town, there he will meet the first girls of the game. After a few talking with all the characters he will use the fishing boat and go to a small fishing spot that is near the island in the sea, he can choose if he wants that the girl goes with him or not. Then the game changes to an underwater view and the player can controls the character when he's doing the underwater fishing, he can fish or find different treasures that are underwater, there is a time limit to be underwater that is show by a decreasing air bar, if it reaches zero the player character will be taken back to the boat. With more time he can also travel to other islands and meet new characters and new girls that can also go with him to do the underwater fishing parts, when he got more than one girl to go with him he can choose who wants to go to underwater (the other will stay in the boat). The game features japanese voice acting for the characters, a lot of different places to go, an interesting character relation system and different fishing spots with different kind of treasures underwater. The second cd contains previews, character profiles and artwork of Happy Salvage, Sister Princess & Yukyu Kumikyoku All Star Project.
